programme.title: Home Cheapo
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E07, Deacon and Kelly buy a vacation home, Carrie is upset because they could have easily afforded it, but they were too cheap.

programme.title: Offensive Foul
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E08, Carrie quickly tires of having to eat meat in private because of Doug forcing his new beliefs onto her.

programme.title: Mild Bunch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E09, Doug reunites with a high-school friend (Adam Sandler) who wants to relive some of their mischievous acts.

programme.title: Manhattan Project
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E10, Carrie sees her dream of living in the city coming true when an apartment becomes available in Manhattan.

programme.title: Single Spaced
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E11, Carrie moves to Manhattan; Doug and Carrie consider adopting a baby after running into friends who recently had a child.

programme.title: China Syndrome Part 1
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E12, Doug discovers that Carrie did not get rid of her apartment in the city; Doug and Carrie receive an unexpected phone call; Arthur and Ava St. Clair's wedding hits a speed bump.

programme.title: China Syndrome Part 2
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E13, Doug discovers that Carrie did not get rid of her apartment in the city; Doug and Carrie receive an unexpected phone call; Arthur and Ava St. Clair's wedding hits a speed bump.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E01, In-laws (Jerry Stiller, Lisa Rieffel) displace Doug Heffernan (Kevin James) and his 70-inch TV from a basement lair; with Leah Remini.

programme.title: Fat City
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E02, Doug tries to trick Carrie into going on a diet after he sees a photo of her overweight mother. With Jerry Stiller.

programme.title: Cello, Goodbye
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E03, Doug feels threatened when Carrie's new job at a law firm gives her a taste of big-city sophistication.

programme.title: Richie's Song
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E04, Doug can't work up the courage to tell Richie (Larry Romano) that his wife (Michele Maika) is cheating on him.

programme.title: Paternal Affairs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E05, Arthur is immediately smitten with Doug's favorite aunt (Brenda Vaccaro) and asks permission to court her.

programme.title: Head First
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E06, Doug makes an effort to be more friendly with Arthur and soon discovers the benefits and risks of allowing his father-in-law to tag along with him in public.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E07, Doug and Carrie debate the advantages of selling her engagement ring after discovering that it is worth a fortune.

programme.title: Educating Doug
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E08, Carrie feels that she and Doug are getting stupid as a couple, so she enrolls them and Spence into a class where they read a book and discuss it.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E09, Doug loses his license to drive after Ray Barone (Ray Romano) cheats off his driving test. Brad Garrett and Peter Boyle also guest star.

programme.title: Supermarket Story
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E10, Doug, Carrie and Arthur face a chaotic trip to the grocery store on the day before Thanksgiving; Doug encounters a stranger from his past.

programme.title: Noel Cowards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E11, Arthur's Christmas gift to Doug and Carrie provides a solution to the couple's car troubles that ends up being worse than the problem.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E12, Carrie fixes Spence (Patton Oswalt) up with an extremely timid girl from her office, but advice from Doug threatens a good thing.

programme.title: Best Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E13, Doug learns that Carrie was once the lover of the groom at a wedding they are attending; Arthur is unhappy when he doesn't get the entree that he ordered at the reception.

programme.title: Dog Days
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E14, A barking dog means sleepless nights for Doug and Carrie; Arthur thinks that a popular comic strip is based on his life.

programme.title: Crappy Birthday
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E15, Doug forgets Carrie's 30th birthday and has plans to watch the wrestling match; Doug must scramble to put together a romantic evening.

programme.title: S'Ain't Valentine's
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E16, Arthur meets an intoxicating stranger at a singles' dance; Carrie and Doug's romantic evening is spoiled.

programme.title: Court Date
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E17, Doug encourages Carrie to date the police officer who stopped her, hoping to get out of her fourth traffic ticket of the year and avoid a hefty increase in their car insurance.

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E18, Doug inherits his shift supervisor's job after an untimely death but soon misses his old responsibilities.

programme.title: Rainy Day
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E19, Ray (Ray Romano) invites Doug to play golf at an exclusive country club; Marie (Doris Roberts) teaches Carrie how to clean a house.

programme.title: Train Wreck
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E20, Doug is disappointed when Carrie isn't jealous of his beautiful trainee; Arthur feels he's been scammed when he orders a gravestone.

programme.title: Hungry Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E21, Carrie is embarrassed by Doug when he shows up unexpectedly and famished at her boss's elegant "drinks-only" cocktail party.

programme.title: Time Share
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E22, Carrie befriends her annoying neighbors so that their week at a Hamptons time share does not go unused; Arthur develops a nasty rash.

programme.title: Where's Poppa?
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E23, Doug convinces cousin Danny (Gary Valentine) to take Arthur for the weekend; Doug is hit by a baseball and meets a new friend (Bill Cosby) at Dr. Becker's (Ted Danson) office.

programme.title: Art House
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E24, Arthur moves into his own apartment after Doug tells him how he feels about his eccentric behavior; Carrie is concerned that her father can't take care of himself.

programme.title: Maybe Baby
programme.desc: King of Queens, S01E25, A visit with Deacon's three-year-old son prompts Doug and Carrie think about having a baby; Arthur recalls the night Carrie was born.

programme.title: Queasy Rider
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E01, Doug buys a motorcycle against Carrie's wishes, prompting her to take up cigarette smoking to spite him.

programme.title: Female Problems
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E02, Doug encourages Carrie to make new friends but then he feels left out when she starts spending a lot of time with their new neighbor.

programme.title: Assaulted Nuts
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E03, After Doug convinces Carrie he doesn't goof around at work, horseplay gets him into a painful and embarrassing predicament.

programme.title: Parent Trapped
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E04, Deacon and Kelly ask Doug and Carrie to be the godparents of their new baby; Arthur is put in charge of the pretzel shop.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E25, In a cliff-hanging season finale, Frasier proposes to Diane while in Europe, wanting to get married the very next day.

programme.title: Birth, Death, Love And Rice
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E01, Frasier returns to Cheers with news that Diane joined a convent.

programme.title: Woody Goes Belly Up
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E02, Sam and Diane surprise Woody with a visit from his hometown girl.

programme.title: Someday My Prince Will Come
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E03, Diane finds a coat and believes the mysterious owner is the man of her dreams.

programme.title: The Groom Wore Clearasil
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E04, Carla's 16-year-old wants to marry his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Diane's Nightmare
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E05, Diane is convinced the crazed actor from her past is out to get her.

programme.title: I'll Gladly Pay You Tuesday
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E06, Sam tries to cover up the truth when he loses Diane's priceless book.

programme.title: 2 Good To Be 4 Reel
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E07, The guys of Cheers try to lift Carla's spirits when she places a personal ad.

programme.title: Love Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E08, Norm hires a private investigator to find out if Vera is having an affair.

programme.title: From Beer To Eternity
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E09, The Cheers gang challenges a rival bar to a bowling tournament.

programme.title: The Bar Stoolie
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E10, Cliff learns his estranged father is leading a secret life.

programme.title: Don Juan Is Hell
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E11, Diane uses Sam as a case study for a paper in her Human Sexuality class, but she paints an unflattering picture of him. Meanwhile, Woody challenges Carla to a sports trivia contest, and Cliff grows a unique squash.

programme.title: Fools And Their Money
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E12, When Woody becomes hooked on football game betting pools, Sam steps in to make him see the error of his ways.

programme.title: Take My Shirt...Please
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E13, Sam realizes his baseball days are history when no one bids on his jersey.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E14, Diane doesn't trust anyone when she's certain revenge is coming her way.

programme.title: The Triangle
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E15, Diane convinces Sam to go to Frasier with fake depression symptoms so that Frasier can analyze him and get his confidence back as a psychiatrist. But Frasier comes back with a diagnosis that Sam's depressed because he's still in love with Diane.

programme.title: Cliffie's Big Score
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E16, Cliff invites Diane and Carla to the annual ball and both unexpectedly accept.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E17, Sam flips when Frasier wants to marry the first girl he dates after Lilith.

programme.title: Peterson Principle
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E18, Norm gets a tip at work that could guarantee his promotion over the competition.

programme.title: Dark Imaginings
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E19, Sam suffers a hernia while trying to prove that he's not getting too old.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance For Me
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E20, Carla turns to Sam as a partner to go up against Nick and Loretta in a dance competition.

programme.title: Fear Is My Co-Pilot
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E21, Sam and Diane reveal their true feelings for each other while on the verge of death.

programme.title: Diane Chambers Day
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E22, Frasier plans a pick-me-up party for Diane, but she thinks it was Sam's idea.

programme.title: Relief Bartender
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E23, Woody feels replaceable when an entertaining bartender overshadows him.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E24, Sam expresses interest in politics when he falls for a woman running for city council.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E25, Diane quits when she finds out Sam's girlfriend wants her fired.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 3)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E26, Diane tries to make Sam's life miserable for pushing her out the door.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E01, It is revealed that it was Diane to whom Sam proposed on the telephone in the last episode.

programme.title: Cape Cad
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E02, Sam's date, Vicki, checks out of a country inn to visit her grandmother in the hospital.

programme.title: Money Dearest
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E03, Cliff fixes his mother, Esther, up with the wealthy Duncan Fitzgerald.

programme.title: Abnormal Psychology
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E04, Frasier appears on a television show for a debate with Dr. Lilith Stern.

programme.title: House Of Horrors With Formal Dining and Used Brick
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E05, Cliff stays the night when Carla gets spooked in her new house.

programme.title: Tan N' Wash
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E06, Norm is excited about a new business venture, a combination laundromat and tanning salon.
